content: FINANCIAL CRIMES ENFORCEMENT NETWORK FINANCIAL CRIMES ENFORCEMENT NETWORK UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF TREASURY FinCEN’s mission is to enhance U.S. national security, deter and detect criminal activity, and safeguard financial systems from abuse by promoting transparency in the U.S. and international financial systems. So my question to FinCEN is, how and why did you allow this economic fiasco to occur? Why do we even have this agency and waste $$Billions of dollars on a bunch of government losers, that failed to see the corruption and the greed, by politicians and CEOs, which in turn caused our economic collapse.

content: probably because wha thte lening market was doing was legal (or barely on the legal side) half the problem is that the CEO's and the politicians figutred out the loopholes in the system, and abused those legal umbrellas. FinCen has to operate under the law, and though they could see hinky activity, they could prove no crime. i liken it to watching a train wreck. it is horrible to see, but you JUST HAVE TO WATCH.
